mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodItmInvHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ HIST_DT , INV_TP_CD , NRMLT_YN , GOD_NO , ITM_NO , SHOP_ID , ORD_NO , CLM_NO , MBR_NO , ADMIN_ID , TOT_USEFUL_INV_IRDS_QTY , ONLNE_LMTT_INV_IRDS_QTY , AFF_COM_LMTT_INV_IRDS_QTY , RESVE_INV_IRDS_QTY FROM GOD_ITM_INV_HIST WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteGodItmInvHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM GOD_ITM_INV_HIST WHERE 1 = 1
